video.title: George Gently
video.synopsis: Inspector George Gently decides to pursue one final case when he suspects the crime is the handiwork of a gangster who murdered Gently's own wife.

episodes.synopsis: Following the murder of his wife by notorious gangster Joe Webster, Inspector George Gently is pondering retirement.
episodes.title: Gently Go Man

episodes.synopsis: When a badly burned body discovered near an RAF base is suspected to be an IRA murder, Branch gets involved.
episodes.title: The Burning Man

episodes.synopsis: When a German businessman is found dead in the sea just off the coast, Gently and Bacchus get involved to find the killer.
episodes.title: Bomber's Moon

episodes.synopsis: Gently and Bacchus stumble upon a world which is beyond their comprehension and belief.
episodes.title: Gently with the Innocents

episodes.synopsis: Gently and Bacchus investigate the death of a young woman whose body is found in a church.
episodes.title: Gently in the Night

episodes.synopsis: Gently and Bacchus investigate the rape and murder of a young woman.
episodes.title: Gently in the Blood

episodes.synopsis: When a body is found in a local mill, Gently and Bacchus go on to uncover a web of local corruption, blackmail, fraud and robbery.
episodes.title: Gently Through the Mill

episodes.synopsis: The body of a young woman is found. Months later, a child disappears. It's up to Gently and Bacchus to discover what connects the two events.
episodes.title: Gently Evil

episodes.synopsis: When an academic is murdered at a political rally, Gently and Bacchus's investigation ensnares them in a town's social and sexual rebellion.
episodes.title: Peace and Love

episodes.synopsis: A schoolgirl's killing brings Gently into the alien world of pop and media celebrity when it turns out the victim's best friend is a rising TV star.
episodes.title: Gently Upside Down

episodes.synopsis: The detective looks into the suspicious death of an old friend and informant when he is told conflicting reasons for the man's demise.
episodes.title: Goodbye China

episodes.synopsis: When a young black girl is murdered, Gently uncovers a disturbing racist undercurrent growing within the local community.
episodes.title: Gently Northern Soul

episodes.synopsis: Gently and Bacchus experience the inflated authority of their "social betters" when a girl is found dead in a car registered to local aristocrats.
episodes.title: Gently With Class

episodes.synopsis: Gently and Bacchus are thrown into an emotionally wrought case when a middle-class couple's adopted child is kidnapped.
episodes.title: The Lost Child

episodes.synopsis: Gently finds himself suspended from duty, powerless, unprotected and persecuted. He must confront his deepest fears and fight to the death.
episodes.title: Gently in the Cathedral

episodes.synopsis: When Bacchus submits his resignation, Gently realizes that what he needs is a boost in confidence, so he asks for Bacchus's help in a difficult case.
episodes.title: Gently Between the Lines

episodes.synopsis: Gently and Bacchus uncover a tawdry story of fame and lust when they investigate the death of a young woman near a seaside resort.
episodes.title: Blue for Bluebird

episodes.synopsis: When a former soldier commits murder, Gently and Bacchus uncover military secrets that shake their faith in the nobility of the armed forces.
episodes.title: Gently with Honour

episodes.synopsis: As Gently and Bacchus investigate a death in a coal mine, they explore tensions that have rocked the surrounding community for decades.
episodes.title: Gently Going Under
